name: Swear Filter
description: Adds a filter to Geometry Dash.

filter-sexual.name: Disallow Sexual Words
filter-sexual.description: Whether or not to hide <cr>sexual words</c>.

filter-racism.name: Disallow Racism
filter-racism.description:
Whether or not to hide <cr>racism</c>.
<cy>(Doesn't censor much.)</c>

filter-antilgbtq.name: Disallow LGBTQ+ Slurs
filter-antilgbtq.description: Whether or not to hide <cr>LGBTQ+ slurs.</c>

censor-level-names.name: Censor Level Names
censor-level-names.description: Whether or not to censor <cg>level names.</c>

censor-level-descriptions.name: Censor Level Desc.
censor-level-descriptions.description: Whether or not to censor <cg>level descriptions.</c>

relax-censor.name: Relax Filter
relax-censor.description: Exposes the first and last characters of the censored word.
